message: Let's make a deal. I take $900,000, you get $100,000.  It's in your best interest to accept now, as the value will decrease for you in future rounds.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This is a fair offer considering the decreasing value over time.  Take it or leave it.
Bob, time is running out for you.  I'm offering you $300,000. That's more than you would have gotten last round if you factor in the 10% decrease.  Accept this generous offer before it's too late!
Alice, it seems like you're overestimating your position.  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 550,000.  This is my final offer. Accept it, or we both walk away with nothing.
